about: I'm a passionate web developer with a knack for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. With a strong foundation in front-end technologies, I specialize in turning complex problems into elegant, interactive solutions. I love to bring ideas to life in the browser.

projects.title: Project One
projects.description: A responsive e-commerce website built with modern front-end technologies to provide a seamless shopping experience.

projects.title: Project Two
projects.description: An interactive data visualization dashboard that displays real-time analytics using D3.js and a custom API.

projects.title: Project Three
projects.description: A sleek and modern landing page for a startup, focusing on performance and clean UI/UX design.
